author: Staff Reporter
text:
A couple visited the Police Commissioner’s Officer On Friday morning to submit a petition seeking protection as the girl’s family did not approve of the marriage.

B. Nirmala, a native of Velapadi cillage in Cuddalore district, had wedded M.S. Vetriselvan, who is from Tiruvanamalai district, in a quiet register marriage at the Royapuram sub registrar office in November 2013. The girl's parents did not approve of the union. The girl’s family is said to be better off financially.

Though both were scheduled caste, they were from different communities, the couple said.
title: Couple seeks police protection
